metadata.title: CVE-2017-8283 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: dpkg-source in dpkg 1.3.0 through 1.18.23 is able to use a non-GNU patchprogram and does not offer a protection mechanism for blank-indented diffhunks, which allows remote attackers to conduct directory traversal attacksvia a crafted Debian source package, as demonstrated by use of dpkg-sourceon NetBSD.

criterions.comment: dpkg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
